text:
Earth is the only watery planet in our solar
system – so where did all our oceans, glaciers,
And why are those rivers often shaped so sinuously?

And speaking of S-shapes, are we humans hard-wired
to fear snakes?

Do our beastly biases mean that we're saving
the wrong species?

How much of who we end up as is determined
before we're even born?

And while we're still in the womb, how many...basic
human functions do we do?

There are endless questions out there about
our amazing planet, but we’re tackling them

one at a time, no matter how big, small, or
weird.

Welcome to MinuteEarth - we’re glad you’re
here.
